attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Richard Brunstrom, Chief Constable of North Wales Police, has overstepped the mark by using harrowing pictures of a road accident to highlight his anti-speeding policies, without obtaining permission from the family of the man involved. This gross lack of judgement must result in his removal from his position as chief constable, a post for which he has shown himself unsuitable.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/northwalespolice/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
